text: Clypeosectus curvus is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Lepetodrilidae. ==Description== ==Distribution== This marine species is found at thermal vents, Juan de Fuca Ridge, Northeast Pacific ==References== ==External links== * Category:Lepetodrilidae Category:Gastropods described in 1989
title: Clypeosectus curvus
